title: JavaScript ES6
content: JS in general is a loose and sloppy language. Not very strong typing of variables which makes it buggy and hard to debug

title: Haskell
content: Haskell is functional language and steep learning curve. After a while it grows on you with the very strong type casting requirements

title: Python
content: Scripting general programming language with lots and lots of libraries, great tool to explore not sure it is good for production though

title: Minizinc
content: Specialized constraint modelling programming language, easy to use but can be hard to debug
